body_html:
@yongtang Thanks for this so quick!
GRPC-1.13.0 is out as of a couple days ago, lets just jump straight to that.
https://github.com/grpc/grpc/releases/tag/v1.13.0

Here so you can just copy-paste:

      name = "grpc",
      urls = [
          "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/grpc/grpc/archive/v1.13.0.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/grpc/grpc/archive/v1.13.0.tar.gz",
      ],
      sha256 = "50db9cf2221354485eb7c3bd55a4c27190caef7048a2a1a15fbe60a498f98b44",
      strip_prefix = "grpc-1.13.0",

GRPC-1.13.0 is out as of a couple days ago, lets just jump straight to that.

body:
@yongtang Thanks for this so quick!
GRPC-1.13.0 is out as of a couple days ago, lets just jump straight to that.
https://github.com/grpc/grpc/releases/tag/v1.13.0

Here so you can just copy-paste:
```
      name = "grpc",
      urls = [
          "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/grpc/grpc/archive/v1.13.0.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/grpc/grpc/archive/v1.13.0.tar.gz",
      ],
      sha256 = "50db9cf2221354485eb7c3bd55a4c27190caef7048a2a1a15fbe60a498f98b44",
      strip_prefix = "grpc-1.13.0",
```
